content:
A professional soccer player can score a goal using his feet or his head. The table below shows how many goals a sample of players scored with different parts of their bodies in the $2014\,\text{-}\,2015$ season (according to www.whoscored.com).
  
**Plot the data in a scatter plot.**  
  
Goals from...| Ronaldo | Neymar | Lacazette | Agüero | Meier |
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: 
**Feet** | $35$ | $20$ | $25$ | $25$ | $15$ 
**Head** | $12$ | $2$ | $2$ | $1$ | $4$
 
[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
